Title: Willows in the spring breeze
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Fresh-eyed youngsters from the city arrive in the countryside for resettlement. During the Cultural Revolution an estimated 12 million boys and girls were sent 'Up to the mountains, down to the villages' in order to be reeducated by the poor and lower-middle peasants.Chunfeng yangliu (春风杨柳) is an idiom to describe the vibrant scene of spring. The four characters also open the second part of Mao Zedong's poem "Farewell to the God of Plague" (送瘟神), dated 1 July 1958.
Theme: Up to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)
